page.title: 15LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: The only outdoor sports of our area are Golf,a friendly game of football or a little clay-pigeon shooting.But the main form of recreation involves indoor activities which are very popular.Some of the indoor sports which are played are Badminton,Squash and Swimming.The games which are also played inside are snooker,darts,cards and bingo.For the arts and craft side of recreation people knit,crochet,sew and embroider.On the media sides of entertainment there is television and video(although this was mainly amongst the younger generation),radio(for the older generation there was night time radio and for young people,radio was a daytime entertainment),and then books,magazines and newspapers were a popular past-time.Entertainment,e.g. cinema,was found outside the block and residents needed transport to it.
